description.title: Description
content: Cake Flavour - Fiasco
Filling of Cake - Blackberry
Weight - Half Kg
Shape - Heart Shaped
Serves - 12-14 People
Size - 6 inches in Diameter
Please Note:
The cake stand, cutlery & accessories used in this image are for presentation only.
This cake is hand delivered in a good quality cardboard box.
Country of Origin: India

delivery.title: Delivery
content: Every cake we offer is handcrafted and since each chef has his/her own unique terms of design and shape.
The chosen delivery time is an estimate and depends on the availability of the product.
Since cakes are perishable in nature, we attempt delivery of your order only once.
This product is hand delivered and will not be delivered along with other courier products.
Occasionally, substitutions of flavours/designs is necessary due to unavailability.

care.title: Care
content: Store cream cakes in a refrigerator. Fondant cakes should be stored in an air-conditioned environment.
Slice and serve the cake at room temperature and make sure it is not exposed to heat.
Use a serrated knife to cut a fondant cake.
Sculptural elements and figurines may contain wire supports or toothpicks or wooden skewers for support.
Please check the placement of these items before serving to small children.
The cake should be consumed within 24 hours.
Enjoy your cake!
